Notes on configuring server elements

1) install Shapely, a python GIS package based on Java JTS library
   website:  http://toblerity.org/shapely

   commandline:  $ pip install Shapely

   you might have to upgrade to 1.4 (if you currently have 1.2 installed):
       $ pip install --upgrade Shapely



2) If you want to run workbench in your devstack, you will have to:
     pip uninstall ora2

   Then to get everything back to normal so you can run lms/studio
     paver devstack lms
     paver devstack studio
